## Introduction 

NSE pre market open data. Pre market is from 09.00 hrs to 09.08 hrs (IST). The function returns a dataframe of pre open market data of current months Futures scripts of F&O stocks 

``` r
# For F&O stocks 
library(nser)
nseopenfo()
```
